name: Claus Pummer
what_you_do: Claus Pummer is a professional sleep expert who provides insights and information on sleep health, including the impact of sleep environments and mattresses on well-being.
who_you_serve: Claus serves individuals and audiences interested in improving their sleep quality and health, including those in the holistic health and wellness space.
signature_programs: 7 Ways Your Mattress is Killing You (book)
bio: Featured in Texas Monthly and various podcasts, including The Life Stylist and Keto Kamp.
business_focus: Claus Pummer is a professional sleep expert who provides insights and information on sleep health, including the impact of sleep environments and mattresses on well-being.
